title: Coronary Artery Disease Treatment Guidelines
content: Coronary artery disease management focuses on symptom control and preventing cardiovascular events. Lifestyle modifications include smoking cessation, heart-healthy diet, and regular exercise. Pharmacotherapy typically includes antiplatelet agents, statins, beta-blockers, and ACE inhibitors. Revascularization via PCI or CABG is considered based on coronary anatomy, symptoms, and ischemic burden.
